alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 9:30PM EST until February 03 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Hazleton. Tippecanoe River near Delphi. Wildcat Creek near Lafayette. .Brief new flooding is expected along several rivers and streams with more widespread flooding ongoing elsewhere across central Indiana. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...From Monday evening to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Flood water is near or starting on Pottsville Road. Low bottomlands are increasingly affected by flood waters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 17.3 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Monday afternoon by around 1230 PM EST /1130 AM CST/.
